data.title: Otome Game Review: Shinobi, Koi Utsutsu
data.meta_description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mgFd5vARrAU When Katagiri Kaede was 7 years old, her family was attacked by some ninja. Her mother & father died, but another ninja came to her rescue and took her to her grandmother to safety. Not knowing his name, Kaede was determined to also grow up to be a ninja and join the Sanada defenseâ€¦
data.text:
When Katagiri Kaede was 7 years old, her family was attacked by some ninja. Her mother & father died, but another ninja came to her rescue and took her to her grandmother to safety. Not knowing his name, Kaede was determined to also grow up to be a ninja and join the Sanada defense force so she could one day protect her loved ones, like how that ninja protected her. One day she runs into the principal of the famous Fujiwara Ninja Training School who tells her to enroll for free because he feels she has the talent to be a great ninja. Kaede is excited to start her first day, but on her first day, she accidentally sets off an illusion jutsu that makes guys fall head over heels for her! Coined as MeroMero Jutsu, Kaede charms any guy within the vicinity of her charm AOE! Because of this, Sanada sensei tells her to pick a guy to â€œtrain withâ€ so she can get her jutsu under control and pass the midterm exam. Unfortunately because the guys she charms are the 6 most popular & capable dudes in the school, sheâ€™s the subject of bullying attacks from jealous bitches.

Sarutobi Sasuke â€“ Since Sasukeâ€™s family are famous Kabuki performers, Sasuke of course has a lot of fangirls. Heâ€™d rather be a ninja dattebayo, but his father and fangirls love him more when he does his fan dance. Of course, the reason that I love him is heâ€™s A FIERY TSUNDERE áƒš(Ìâ—‰â—à±ªâ—Ÿâ—‰â€µáƒš)ï¼ï¼ Heâ€™s tsuntsun for a while, calls her meromero onna and gets mad when she puts him under her spellâ€¦because it makes him ULTRA DERE and he just barfs up sweet words non stop to her xDDD. Since after the fact he can still â€œremember what he saidâ€ while under the charm it causes his face to be as red as his hair. ï¼ˆ*Â´â–½ï½€*ï¼‰ After a while, he finally derefies enough to not only show her his kabuki dance, but also starts to proudly call her by her first name. During the summer camp event, when Kaede gets hurt and Sasuke licks some of her blood, everyone discovers that by drinking her blood it makes them immune to her genjutsu. Itâ€™s also discovered that Kaede has the powers of the Kirihime, an illusionist who would set this â€œmeromero fogâ€ which would cause anyone within it be charmed. On the day of the midterm exam, everyone but Kaede & the dudes she charmed are acting like zombies. To find out the deal, Sasuke gives in and goes to ask for help from his dad who he absolutely canâ€™t stand. The dad says he knows about the genjutsu (which is apparently a forbidden jutsu) but refuses to tell Sasuke anything. He says Sasuke should just follow the family tradition and do Kabuki in his shoes and stop with the ninja shit. Sasuke rages and almost burns his important fan but Kaede blows it away saying she knows how heâ€™s treated it very special to him. And so Sasuke & dad talk things over and dad says if Sasuke really enjoys dancing, then heâ€™ll be waiting for him to return when he gets the ninjaing out of his system. They get a letter telling Kaede from the Tokugawa to â€œcome and not tell anyoneâ€ because they need her to perform a forbidden jutsu.

They go together to fight all the ninja dudes and kick all their asses. Turns out the principal of the school is the leader of the Tokugawa and the final boss! And says he wants to use Kaede to perform his forbidden jutsus so he can have himself a lethal army to take over Japan bwahaha! Sasukeâ€™s like hell no u aint takin mah woman and they fight but Sasuke canâ€™t stand up to superpowered GGE. GGE says that Kaede is a sad woman who will never be loved because of her illusionist powers and then casts a jutsu over Sasuke. But ainâ€™t no thang cause Sasuke bites Kaedeâ€™s boob and gets some blood to prevent himself from being paralyzed! XD He then tells the GGE that it donâ€™t matter that she has meromero jutsu cause heâ€™s in love with her regardless (*Â´ï½ªï½€*)ï½·ï½­ï¾â™¡ With their powers combined they defeat the GGE. Just then Sanada sensei shows up in disguise saying GGE is under arrest. He asks if Kaede & Sasuke wanna join the defense force after they graduate. End: Kaede passes her exam because of her victory over the GGE. Sasuke admits that he really loves Kabuki and he plans to return to performing, in exchange that his bitchy fangirls stop bullying Kaede. He tells Kaede that he wonâ€™t be quitting his ninja training anytime soon though since now he can be with her since she passed her exam. He says he plans to join the defense forces when he graduates but also be a Kabuki actor. He then confesses that he loves her once more and now that theyâ€™re both in love, it seals her out of control meromero jutsu. They smooch and in the epilogue, everyone goes to see Sasukeâ€™s dance practice. He tsuntsuns but then admits that he really wants her to come see his performance and she says that his dad has already given her a ticket xDD. He then derederes about how much he loves her basically proposes to her and they live adorably ever after. I love these kind of Terashima characters and I feel like itâ€™s been a while since I heard him in this kind of role.

Yuri Kamakiyo â€“ Yuri is a muttsuri sukebe megane so he acts like heâ€™s this elite and proper dude, but deep down inside heâ€™s just lusting to jump into Kaedeâ€™s hakama. (ï¿£ãƒ¼ï¿£)ï¾†ï¾”ï¾˜ That means that when heâ€™s under the meromero charm, the TRUTH COMES OUT and he turns into this ero do-S xDDD. Heâ€™s a hard worker though, and stays up all night just to help Kaede with her training. Heâ€™s prolly muttsuri though because his childhood friend is Daisuke whoâ€™s always surrounded by the ladies. He notices that the bitches are bullying her and goes to tell them to fuck off and leave Kaede alone. Unfortunately Kaede sees him talking to them (and making them cry) and thinks that one of the bitches is his girlfriend! Î£(ï¾ŸĞ´ï¾Ÿlll)ï½¶ï¾ï½°ï¾ Kaede gets all sad and jelly and tells Yuri that sheâ€™s gonna train on her own and that sheâ€™s unfit to be his partner. Yuri then is sent into a fit of despair that maybe heâ€™s not good enough like his oniisama~ lol misunderstandings. Fortunately the misunderstanding is dispelled and Yuri explains that that he was just telling that bitch to stop bullying Kaede. He then says that he wants to only have Kaede as his partner (*Â´ï½ªï½€*)ï½·ï½­ï¾â™¡ and then confesses that he loves her.

And so as usual Tokugawa threatens to go after Kaede so Yuri comes along with her to fight him. Kaedeâ€™s wind attack works this time to stop the ninjas who attack them since before she kept failing to get the technique right. After Tokugawa shows up and they battle as usual, he casts the genjutsu on Yuri but as usual Kaede gives him her blood making him immune to it. They combine their wind & lightning powers and defeat the GGE. Just then Yuriâ€™s older brother shows up and says to come to Oosaka when he graduates to join the defense force. End: Kaede passes her exam and perfects her wind technique. Yuri asks Kaede to always train with him from now on because he loves her. Unfortunately they all get cockblocked by everyone who hears his passionate confession xDDD. They then use their jutsu to surround themselves in fog & flower petals so they can make out without the others seeing (ã€‚â‰–Ë‡âˆ€Ë‡â‰–ã€‚). In the epilogue, Yuri is nervous & babbling like an idiot because its his first time in Kaedeâ€™s room èŒâ”ï¾Ÿâ˜†;ï½¡+(*pqâ€²ãƒ¼ï½€)+ï½¡;â˜†ï¾Ÿâ”èŒ . He canâ€™t hold back da muttsuri though and they â€¦do all sorts of fun things happily ever after xDD. I know it seems short but Yuriâ€™s route was really hilarious with all dat muttsuriâ€¦especially the sprite of him pushing his fogged glasses while his face became bright red xD. Sadly the flow pretty much followed Sasukeâ€™s route so there wasnâ€™t much else new and it ended quickly ;_;.

Kirigakure Kuroudo â€“ I hate this guys name because both first name and last name are so awkward to pronounce. Kuroudo is Mr. Perfect and he always aces every single one of his ninja exams. Heâ€™s often used as a model during ninja lessons and he never ever fails. That is, until he starts falling in love with Kaede! When under the meromero charm, he goes from cool prince to gentle prince charming xD. Not only that but because he spent his life trying to be perfect, he didnâ€™t have no time for love and well Kaede is basically his first crush. Dâ€™aww. (*ï¾Ÿâˆ€ï¾Ÿ) Once he begins to fall in love with her, he constantly starts getting all âˆ‘>â€•â™¡(((Â´Ğ´ï½€ÎŸ)â†’ãšãã‚…ãƒ¼ã‚“â˜†Â°ï¼Š*ã€‚ and hnnggg around Kaede lol. During training one day he ends up toppling her on the ground and doesnâ€™t wanna get up and blurts out that he gets everything he wantsâ€¦.including her ;DDD After this his headâ€™s in lala land about Kaede and his Mr. Perfect image begins to crumble as he messes up all his class training. He gets so frustrated he goes to fight his own shadow clone but has trouble doing so while Kaede tells him he donâ€™t need to do that cause heâ€™s perfect as he is. After Kaede defeats his clone herself to protect him, he reveals that he and his younger brother Tadahito were secret love children of some hime and someone from Tokugawa. Tokugawa killed their parents though and ever since then Kuroudoâ€™s vowed to take revenge. One afternoon Kuroudo says that his brother is MIA and they both go searching for him. They find him getting kidnapped by the Tokugawa ninjas and Kuroudo beats them up. Afterwards Kaede comes to Kuroudoâ€™s house which is all poor and beatup. There Kaede tells them how she lived most of her life alone since her parents were killed as well. She then realizes how much of a hard worker Kuroudo is and that he wasnâ€™t born with talent, he worked his fucking ass off Ñ‰(à²¥Ğ”à²¥Ñ‰) After they have dinner, Kaede tells Kuroudo that she enjoyed spending time with him and eating dinner with him like a family because sheâ€™s always eating alone in her dorm room. He tells her that if she ever feels lonely she can come be with him at anytime.

When he walks her back to the school dorms he canâ€™t hold himself back and kisses her neck but then she babbles about how sheâ€™s sorry that he had to constantly be with her for the training of her meromero jutsu. He gets all mad and says that he never felt forced to train with her at all. And so as usual Kaede and her dude go to where theyâ€™re calling her out because of her blood. Itâ€™s all part of the exam but the teachers are under the genjutsu and act like zombies. To make things worse, Tadahito is there too and heâ€™s also under the jutsu and Kuroudo just canâ€™t bear to attack his brother. Just then evil GGE shows up and while Kuroudoâ€™s busy with his brother, GGE takes the opportunity to go after Kaede and her blood. After Kuroudo finds out that GGE is the final boss, he runs to help Kaede and then yells at her for not relying on him and that he wants to graduate with her. Kuroudo then uses his kagebunshin no jutsu but GGE casts kinjutsu again. As usual thanks to Kaedeâ€™s blood tho, he manages to overcome it and combined with Kaedeâ€™s power they defeat him. End: Kaede passes the exam and tells him that she doesnâ€™t care about bullying from the bitches because sheâ€™s aiming to get into the defense force. Kuroudo kisses her and tells her that he loves her saying heâ€™s actually happy that she does the charm on him because itâ€™s proof that he makes her all dokidoki (*Â´Ï‰ï½€*). And after she confesses that she loves him, the meromero jutsu is sealed because her heart now belongs to him. He then proposes to her and in the epilogue, she comes over Kuroudoâ€™s place to have dinner with him and his bro. And then while the bro goes out, Kuroudo starts ichaichaing with a sleeping Kaede. My only gripe with this route is the choice of CGs in this route is awful, a CG where one wasnâ€™t needed or CGs that didnâ€™t have Kaede in them T_T. Also the sudden outburst of feels from Kuroudo felt so shoed in I got really confused on what the hell was going on. (Like a chunk of scenario was missing or something lol.) Still I think Kaede and Kuroudo are similar to each other which made understanding each other easy..except the fact that now Tadahitoâ€™s a 3rd wheel xD.

Anayama Daisuke â€“ DAISUKE WAS A SURPRISING TWIST FOR ME. I sat here thinking sigh not another manwhore character surrounded by jealous bitches (if I didnâ€™t get enough of them in the last 3 routesâ€¦) BUT TURNS OUT ITS ALL AN ACT AND HEâ€™S A FUCKING SWEETHEART ï¼ˆ*Â´â–½ï½€*ï¼‰ï¼ï¼ï¼ Daisuke is a medic ninja and when under the meromero jutsu, he becomes a gentle prince charming who will protect the chastity of his princess! Welp turns out, thatâ€™s basically his internal feelings anyway and in fact none of the girls who constantly jump on him he gives a ratâ€™s ass about. At first Daisuke gets disappointed when Kaede doesnâ€™t fall for his manwhorey ways and it only motivates him to try and get her! On top of this, heâ€™s actually been protecting her from the shadows against all the bitches who bully her. Even though Daisuke tells her heâ€™s a horrible man playing with womenâ€™s heart and not to get close to him Kaede realizes what a sweet dude he is beyond his fake exterior and it makes her âˆ‘>â€•â™¡(((Â´Ğ´ï½€ÎŸ)â†’ãšãã‚…ãƒ¼ã‚“â˜†Â°ï¼Š*ã€‚Turns out his dadâ€™s a manwhore and his lover #7 is just a gold digger tho. Thatâ€™s why Daisuke hates women cause theyre just after him for his talents and his fatherâ€™s money. Kaete tells him that money canâ€™t buy everything and she will use her ninja powers to get into the Sanada defense for herserlf. Eventually Daisuke starts falling for Kaede and even stops letting girls into the nurseâ€™s office. Heâ€™s retired from his manwhore ways becuase of Kaede telling him how itâ€™s bad to do. At summer trip he tastes her blood â€“ and gets immune to the jutsu. Though he gets all ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ³(*Â´Ï‰ï½€*) when she tells him to heal Sasukeâ€™s wounds while she kicks asses of all the enemy ninjas xD. HELL YEA KAEDE IS BADASS IN THIS ROUTE. One day Kaede hears Sasukeâ€™s fangirls crying cause the bitches Daisuke dumped have been bullying them (lol too bad so sad.). When she asks him why he doesnâ€™t care heâ€™s like cause im a huge douche lawl. Sheâ€™s like youâ€™re not a douche, I know how much of a sweet heart you are and heâ€™s like !!!!!!!! cause someone actually cares about him on a non shallow level.

Daisuke tells Kaede that he can no longer lie to her and say fake sweet words, including doing the training for her meromero jutsu. Kaede thinks he hates her or something and runs off all sad and heâ€™s all like nooo bebe I donâ€™t know how to express mah feelings!! And eventually he canâ€™t hold back all his feels and he jumps on her in the nurseâ€™s office while they are hiding from all the zombie teachers & students during the exam day xD. He then confesses that heâ€™s in love with her and that sheâ€™s the first person heâ€™s ever felt this way about. Kaedeâ€™s in love with him too but is afraid that if she tells him that heâ€™ll ravage her in bed (/Ï‰ï¼¼)ï½²ï¾”ï¾. He takes her to his place to be away from the school since Tokugawaâ€™s after her there. She wants to repay him for letting her bum around so she decides to fix his hair but just her touching his hair makes him âˆ‘>â€•â™¡(((Â´Ğ´ï½€ÎŸ)â†’ãšãã‚…ãƒ¼ã‚“â˜†Â°ï¼Š*ã€‚ and he canâ€™t hold himself back again lol xD. Just then, she catches Daisuke talking with sensei about protecting her. For a change of pace they go out with her in disguise. Heâ€™s had it ready for her for like 2 weeks before the exam and together he goes to buy her more presents on their date xD Unfortunately their day is ruined when they run into his manslut dad with his 7th gold digger whore wife. Some guy is there too who steals his wallet saying that heâ€™s probably rich and fulla cash cause heâ€™s a doctor, rather than giving a fuck that Daisuke just cured his stupid ass. After they return home he tells Kaede that this is the kind of environment he was raised in and all he knows is money. Kaedeâ€™s like NO BEBE U A SWEETIE U AINâ€™T LIKE DAT SHITTY FAMILY OF URS. Kaede then finally admits that she loves him and heâ€™s like ï½½ï¾ï½·ï½­â”â”(*ã€ƒÂ´â„«ï½€ã€ƒ)â”â”>>ï¾ï½¯ï¼ And so Daisuke canâ€™t hold back any longer and they make lovinâ€™ all night (/â–½*ï¼¼)ï½â™ª ï½²ï¾”ï½§ï¾.

Next morning Kaede finds Daisuke MIA so she goes around the mountains looking for him. She finds him fighting Tokugawa GGE and finds out who the GGE really is. While they fight the GGE reveals that itâ€™s in Daisukeâ€™s bloodline to protect the legendary illusion jutsu â€œprincessâ€ aka Kaede (which after finishing the game makes me think heâ€™s somehow related to Sanada??). Kaede starts doubting him and thinks that all this time maybe he really only acted nice to her because of her powers. GGE then uses his powers to control Daisuke to attack Kaede so he asks her to stab him instead. So yea to break the jutsu, he sucks some of her blood and hugs her saying that he did protect her because of his bloodline, but he fell in love on his own accord. (*Â´Ï‰ï½€*) And so with the power of love they defeat the stupid GGE. End: Kaede passes her exam and runs to Daisuke to tell him the good news. Daisuke congratulates her telling her it was all her effort and then reveals heâ€™s NEVER REALLY DATED ANYONE. He says that the girls who came to him were just â€œmoneyâ€ to him and if he ever dated anyone it would only be for the purpose of marriage. SO PURE MAN xDDDD |èŒ|ï½¥Â´âˆ€`ï½¥)ï¾Šï½§ï¾Šï½§ èŒãˆã‡ã‡â†‘ So needless to say he asks her to continue dating him and then marry him. (*Â´Ï‰ï½€*) He tells her that heâ€™s graduating soon to become a doctor and wants her to come with him as he sets up his own clinic. Kaede of course says I DO BEBE TAKE ME and they kiss. This also seals her genjutsu as usual so she no longer spits meromero everywhere. In the epilogue, Kaede makes him some tamagoyaki which was his favorite food as a child. And so they cuddle in the nurseâ€™s office & promise to be together happily ever after~. (ï¾‰Â´âˆ€ï½€*)ï¾‰ I wonder one thing though, if Daisukeâ€™s bloodline is supposed to protect Kaede, wtf were they doing 10 years ago?? Though I guess he would have been too young to do anything since he would have only been like 8 years old. Anyway, I was shocked, I never thought Iâ€™d like Daisuke but I ended up liking him a lotâ€¦well that is untilâ€¦

Garaiya â€“ GARAIYAâ€™S MY FAVORITE BABY!!!!! Heâ€™s not only chuunibyou, but heâ€™s also a lonely tsundere (or maybe a tsunshun!?) and all he wanted was a friend to care about his adorable self ï¼ˆ*Â´â–½ï½€*ï¼‰!! The bitches are extra terrible in this route, they rip up her dictionary even though she worked her ass off to be able to afford to buy itâ€¦all because the 6 popular guys â€œtalkedâ€ to her. So because of this she decides to go to the library and Garaiya happens to be the librarian. Since heâ€™s way ahead of the class, he doesnâ€™t need to attend and spends most of the time cooped up all sad and lonely in the library. When Kaede comes to visit him heâ€™s so happy he finally has a visitor but for her its a place to escape from the bullying. When Garaiya goes meromero he becomes a yandere infatuated by love and all he wants to do is just spend 24/7 with Kaede all alone away from others xDD. Since he is a neet/hikki who is ronery and wants friends but no one will friend him ;-; Kaedeâ€™s like its ok I have no friends either, letâ€™s hang! ğŸ˜† So they end up spending time in his little hikki room in the library reading books & drinking tea. Turns out Garaiyaâ€™s working for Tokugawa GGE but since heâ€™s in love with Kaede he canâ€™t bring himself to hurt her. Since Garaiyaâ€™s totally in love with her (for being like the only person who gives a crap about him), he starts protecting her from all of Tokugawaâ€™s ninjas who then call him a traitor. He takes her on a date a couple days later and they kyakya ufufuf at the summer festival together.

Afterwards heâ€™s so tired that he babbles his way into letting him rest in her lap èŒâ”ï¾Ÿâ˜†;ï½¡+(*pqâ€²ãƒ¼ï½€)+ï½¡;â˜†ï¾Ÿâ”èŒ He then says that he just wanted to spend time with her to be like actual loversâ€¦until their sweet time is interrupted because one of Tokugawaâ€™s spies was watching them and Garaiya realizes it. He then thanks Kaede for everything and the next day heâ€™s missing from the library and Kaede canâ€™t find him anywhere (Â´ï¼›Ï‰ï¼›ï½€)The following day everyoneâ€™s under the zombie jutsu and Garaiyaâ€™s still MIA. Kaede looks for clues on where he is and finds all those letters heâ€™s been secretly writing as a form of a diary. (Â´ï¼›Ï‰ï¼›ï½€) She then finds out that he was aiming to capture her but he couldnâ€™t bring himself to do it. At the end of his letters he writes that he loves Kaede and that he doesnâ€™t want Tokugawa to take her and use her for her blood. She gives up finding him and instead goes to do her exam but during the exam, Garaiya attacks her saying he has to capture her. Unfortunately because his true heart doesnâ€™t feel that way, he canâ€™t command his puppets to actually do any damage and he barely even tries. Kaede tells him she knows that heâ€™s working for Tokugawa and heâ€™s like yep he wants your blood. She says that she read his diary letters so she knows that he doesnâ€™t really wanna work for Tokugawaâ€¦and knows how he feels about her. (ã€‚â‰–Ë‡âˆ€Ë‡â‰–ã€‚) Just then GGE shows up to cockblock and says that Garaiyaâ€™s from the Date clan that ruled the Sengoku period and that was destroyed by the Toyotomi family, which was later then taken over by Tokugawa. So because of this Garaiyaâ€™s clan has to serve the Tokugawa clan now, and by going against him it would be a ä¸‹å…‹ä¸Š. His real name is Date Koremune. Garaiya then tells Kaede that itâ€™s not that he wants to be loyal towards Tokugawa, but someone with the Date blood, he has nowhere to go anyway (Â´ï¼›Ï‰ï¼›ï½€).

Kaede gets pissed at the GGE telling him heâ€™s an asshole for calling Garaiya his dog and says she will fight for him because he was her first friend. She gets hurt really bad but manages to tell Garaiya that heâ€™s not alone and that no matter what she wants to always be with him, no matter what his bloodline is. Garaiya decides for shit to get real and turns into his true form where heâ€™s a FUCKING SEXY BEAST AND KICKS THE STUPID GGEâ€™S ASS. ãƒ¾( ã€ƒÏ‰ã€ƒ)ï½¯ ï½·ãƒ£ãƒ¼ãƒ¼ãƒ¼ãƒƒâ™ª Afterwards the Sanada defense force shows up and takes GGE into custody. Sensei says that he knew everything lawl but needed to find proof to arrest Tokugawa. After Kaede is healed by Daisuke, Garaiya cries and begs her to forgive him saying heâ€™ll spend his life repaying her for this. Sasuke tells him that now that his secretâ€™s out he should just attend class with everyone else like normal and stop being a hikkikomori in the library. End: Garaiya remains in his true form but his personality is the same and heâ€™s still a bumbling chuuni tsundere xD. Kaede passes her midterm exam with a perfect score. He then takes off his eye patch saying he doesnâ€™t need that or his former name anymore because itâ€™s all in the past. He then gives her a huge boquet of roses and a very long & detailed love confession. IT WAS SO AMAZING GARAIYA BABYYY â–‚â–…â–‡â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘(â€™Ï‰â€™)â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆâ–‡â–…â–‚ï½³ï¾œï½±ï½±ï½±ï½§ï½§ï½§ï½§!!! He then kisses her and the confession turns into a marriage proposal (*Â´âˆ€ï½€)ã‚€ãµâ™ª. In the epilogue Garaiya and Kaede are at a summer festival the following year and ichaicha together as they go through all the stands. (*Â´Ï‰ï½€*) Lol god he was so adorable, I donâ€™t think Iâ€™ve liked a Shimono Hiro character this much since likeâ€¦Lucia from Beastmaster xDDD. Needless to say, he ended up being the best route and best guy for me in the game ^q^!!

Sanada Yukikage â€“ Sanada is clearly the canon OTP of the route but since I love Garaiya so much (and the annoying student teacher trope) he wasnâ€™t as good as I had hoped. Still sensei has his cute moments like everyone else and was still a good route that pretty much concluded the entire plot. Sanada notices her getting bullied by the bitches so he decides to tutor her privately. Other guys think that his private tutoring is â€œhellâ€ but since its Kaede, it becomes heaven ğŸ˜† the other guys try to help her out but he catches all of them and kicks them out ğŸ˜› When he goes meromero he becomes an ero sensei but itâ€™s all because it gives him an excuse to tell her how he REALLY feelsâ€¦since otherwise oh noes student x teacher is a no no! When he asks her why she became a ninja she tells him how she wants to protect those she loved, just like how a certain ninja protected her when she was little *cough hack, Sanada totally knows it was her (ï¿£ãƒ¼ï¿£)ï¾†ï¾”ï¾˜. At the school training trip, Sanada finds the GGE and tries to accuse him of being a traitor but the GGE says he was just making sure the â€œstudents didnâ€™t get hurtâ€. After the ninjas are defeated, Sanada tells Kaede to be careful and that her meromero thing is a genjutsu and that Tokugawaâ€™s after her blood. So like 3 months later, Kaede becomes superwoman and is able to defeat even Kirigakure during class tests thanks to ~private lessons~ from Sanada ;D. After the 3 months special lessons end, Sensei tells her that he has no problem continuing to do one on one lessons with her and she doesnâ€™t need to go train alone. Kaede of course is all like oh noes I donâ€™t wanna burden you sensei. The other guys offer to help her out as well and tell sensei that he doesnâ€™t need to be with her 24/7 for everything. Sensei gets jelly but Kaede says that she likes him the way he is and regards highly of him as her teacher (*Â´Ï‰ï½€*). One day she stumbles upon Sanada telling Daisuke not to make Kaede his play thing like he does with all the other girls. He tells him about how sheâ€™s the illusionist and Kaede now thinks that this is the only reason Sanada ever helped her or acted nice to her. The next day some evil ninja takes the form of Sanada and tricks Kaede into going into some empty area in the forest. He attacks Kaede and slices her arm to get her blood.

Turns out that it was just the GGE in disguise and just then the real Sanada shows up to save her. The GGE throws a smoke bomb so Kaede canâ€™t actually see anything of whatâ€™s going on. After the GGE runs off, Sanada yells at her for being so easily fooled by a disguise. Heâ€™s mostly upset that he thought they were â€œclose enoughâ€ that she could tell a real from a fake even though he knows that her ninjutsu isnâ€™t that high of a level. After she does a meromero on him, he tells her afterwards that if he ever tries to touch her or anything, its only the jutsu and she shouldnâ€™t think anything more of it which makes both of them upset. After this he doesnâ€™t do any one on one lessons with her and mostly avoids her outside of class. A few days later, Sanada asks Kaede to come with him to the summer festival where they go on a nice boat ride. THIS GAME REVIVED MY OTOME GAMING MOTIVATION. Seriously I loved every single dude in this game which is a RARITY since thereâ€™s always that ONE landmine who I want to throw into a black hole. NOPE NOT HERE. EVERY GUY IS MOEEEEE ï¼ˆ*Â´â–½ï½€*ï¼‰ï¼

I seriously have a hard time picking my favorite ranking order but I guess when it comes down to it Garaiya > Sasuke > Kamikiyo > Daisuke > Sanada > Kuroudo. It doesnâ€™t mean that like the guys in the end are bad it just means that I just loved the others a LITTLE BIT MORE. They are ALL WONDERFUL! (*Â´âˆ€ï½€*) Now as far as heroine is concerned, I wonâ€™t lie at first she kind of annoyed me. When bitches attacked her, sheâ€™d just be like oh noes its my fault for setting off the meromero I deserve it etc. No damnit you donâ€™t deserve it go beat them up! But I guess thatâ€™s just how she is and I thought she was at her best in Garaiyaâ€™s, Daisukeâ€™s and Sanadaâ€™s routes. Seriously she kicked so much ass in those battles that I will forgive her for putting up with the shit from the stupid bitches. On the topic of bitches, I really hated how they caused shit in EVERY SINGLE ROUTE. Even routes like Garaiya, who doesnâ€™t even have fangirls, theyâ€™d still trash her stuff just because she â€œtalkedâ€ to the other guys. Give me a break :roll:. Havenâ€™t seen this kind of b/s since Hanaoni and I really hope to never see it again. If you leave the name default, the guys WILL call her by her name which was a pleasant surprise. Music was amazing and Iâ€™m still looping the OP song on repeat. Apparently the composer also did the bgms for Diabolik Lovers and Renai Bancho which explains everything! Anyway overall I am very pleased with this game, and even if some scenario was copy pasta, the individual guys personalities were charming enough to make up for it. I loved the game so much I blew through it and when it ended I was SO SAD.
